
public class Assignmentoperator {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int num1 = 100, num2 = 20;

		System.out.println("num1 += num2 = " + (num1 + num2));

		System.out.println("num1 -= num2 = " + (num1 - num2));

		System.out.println("num1 *= num2 = " + (num1 * num2));

		System.out.println("num1 /= num2 = " + (num1 / num2));

		System.out.println("num1 %=  num2 = " + (num1 % num2));

	}

}
